title: Buying Property
question: How do I start the process of buying a home?
context: Begin by browsing listings on our site, then contact the agent listed for the property to schedule a viewing or get more details.

title: Selling Property
question: How can I list my property for sale?
context: Create an account, navigate to 'Post a Listing,' fill in property details, upload photos, and submit for approval by our team.

title: Agent Contact
question: How can I contact an agent directly?
context: Each property page includes the agent’s profile with a ‘Contact Agent’ button that allows you to send a direct message or request a call.

title: Property Verification
question: Are listings verified before being posted?
context: Yes, all listings undergo a verification process to ensure they are legitimate and accurately described before going live.

title: Rental Listings
question: Can I find rental properties on your platform?
context: Yes, you can filter properties by type and choose 'For Rent' to view available rental listings in your preferred location.

title: Payment Options
question: Do I need to pay to list my property?
context: Basic listings are free, but premium listings that offer more visibility and priority placement require a small fee.

title: Site Security
question: Is my personal information safe when using this site?
context: Absolutely. We use secure encryption and comply with data privacy laws to protect all user and transaction information.

title: Mortgage Assistance
question: Do you help with mortgage or financing options?
context: Yes, we partner with local banks and mortgage providers. You can explore financing options in the 'Mortgage Center' section.

title: Property Types
question: What types of properties are listed?
context: Our platform features residential homes, apartments, commercial buildings, and land for sale or rent across multiple regions.

title: Account Management
question: How can I edit or remove my property listing?
context: Log into your account, go to 'My Listings,' select the property you wish to edit or delete, and apply your changes.
